languages.text: "Да не устрашат сердца верных гнусные речи врагов Человечества, да укрепится вера наша пред ликом всякой скверны и погани..."
"May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."
languages.original_text: "Да не устрашат сердца верных гнусные речи врагов Человечества, да укрепится вера наша пред ликом всякой скверны и погани..."

traits.locale_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “愿虔诚之人的心灵永远不会被人类之敌的卑鄙言论所害，愿我们的信仰在面对腐化与污秽时愈发坚强……”
languages.original_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."

traits.locale_text: “愿虔诚之人的心灵永远不会被人类之敌的卑鄙言论所害，愿我们的信仰在面对腐化与污秽时愈发坚强……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Que le cœur des fervents reste de marbre face au verbe des ennemis de l'humanité, et que la corruption et l'infamie renforcent notre foi... »
languages.original_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."

traits.locale_text: « Que le cœur des fervents reste de marbre face au verbe des ennemis de l'humanité, et que la corruption et l'infamie renforcent notre foi... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Que los corazones de los fieles no se amedrenten ante las blasfemas palabras de los enemigos de la Humanidad y que nuestra fe sea reforzada ante la corrupción y la vileza...».
languages.original_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."

traits.locale_text: «Que los corazones de los fieles no se amedrenten ante las blasfemas palabras de los enemigos de la Humanidad y que nuestra fe sea reforzada ante la corrupción y la vileza...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「信心深い人々の心が、人類の敵の卑劣な言動に臆することがないように。あらゆる腐敗と汚れに直面しても、私たちの信仰が強められますように...」
languages.original_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."

traits.locale_text: 「信心深い人々の心が、人類の敵の卑劣な言動に臆することがないように。あらゆる腐敗と汚れに直面しても、私たちの信仰が強められますように...」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Mögen die Herzen der Gläubigen nicht von den schändlichen Worten der Feinde der Menschheit geprüft werden, möge unser Glaube im Angesicht aller Korruption und Fäulnis gestärkt werden ..."
languages.original_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."

traits.locale_text: "Mögen die Herzen der Gläubigen nicht von den schändlichen Worten der Feinde der Menschheit geprüft werden, möge unser Glaube im Angesicht aller Korruption und Fäulnis gestärkt werden ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "İnananların kalpleri, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının adi sözleri karşısında yılmasın. İnancımız yozluğun ve azgınlığın karşısında daha da güçlensin..."
languages.original_text: "May the hearts of the faithful not be daunted by the vile speeches of the foes of Humanity, may our faith be strengthened in the face of all corruption and foulness..."

traits.locale_text: "İnananların kalpleri, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının adi sözleri karşısında yılmasın. İnancımız yozluğun ve azgınlığın karşısında daha da güçlensin..."
